title: Honey Stewed Squid - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life   Sports
tags: Adapted to Drama   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Cosplay   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   e-Sports   Female Protagonist   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Loli   Love at First Sight   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Singers
author: Mo Bao Fei Bao   墨宝非宝
description: Tong Nian, a cosplay cover singer, falls in love at first sight with a man she spots at a Net cafe. Chasing him, she signs up for the MMO she saw him playing, albeit it’s a super high ranked account a friend acquired for her. Who could have known he was a pro gamer, moreover a legend in the gaming circle at that!>
